other_tests.findings: No mutations detected by single-strand conformational polymorphism analysis of the PCR-amplified SHOX, but identified one case with complete SHOX deletion.
GH peak serum levels of 5.3 ng/mL in the boy and 10.0 ng/mL in the girl; low mean GH levels of spontaneous night secretion.
Mild triangulation of the carpal bones was observed.

other_tests.date: First 12 months of treatment, exact date not specified
other_tests.findings: Significant acceleration of growth, height increased from -23.5 SDS to -22.5 SDS (girl) and -22.5 SDS to -21.6 SDS (boy).
other_tests.changes_over_time: Growth of the lower extremities was weaker than in the trunk and arms.
